### HOW TO CONFIGURE THE PLUGIN AFTER IT HAS BEEN ENABLED:
### Using the Vault CLI

```
vault write -format=json vault-ethereum/config  rpc_url=http://ganache:8545 chain_id=5777

```
### Sample Response


```json
{
  "bound_cidr_list": null,
  "chain_id": "5777",
  "exclusions": null,
  "inclusions": null,
  "rpc_url": "http://ganache:8545"
}
```

### HOW TO CREATE AN ACCOUNT NAMED BOB USING A MNEMONIC:
### Using the Vault CLI

```
vault write -format=json 'vault-ethereum'/accounts/bob mnemonic='volcano story trust file before member board recycle always draw fiction when'

```
### Sample Response


```json
{
  "address": "0x90259301a101A380F7138B50b6828cfFfd4Cbf60",
  "exclusions": null,
  "inclusions": null
}
```

### 1: GET  BOBS ADDRESS:
### Using the Vault CLI

```
vault read -format=json vault-ethereum/accounts/bob

```
### Sample Response


```
"0x90259301a101A380F7138B50b6828cfFfd4Cbf60"
```

### HOW TO CREATE AN ACCOUNT NAMED ALICE WITH NO MNEMONIC:
### Using the Vault CLI

```
vault write -f -format=json vault-ethereum/accounts/alice

```
### Sample Response


```json
{
  "address": "0xa6563cd02d14eB74a2e385cd96feD04bcaf2c5C1",
  "exclusions": null,
  "inclusions": null
}
```

### HOW TO TRANSFER 0.5 ETH FROM BOB TO ALICE:
### 1: CONVERT 0.5 ETH TO WEI:
### Using the Vault CLI

```
vault write -format=json vault-ethereum/convert unit_from=ETH unit_to=WEI amount=0.5

```
### Sample Response


```json
{
  "amount_from": "0.5",
  "amount_to": "500000000000000000",
  "unit_from": "ether",
  "unit_to": "wei"
}
```

Amount "500000000000000000"
### 2: GET ALICES ADDRESS:
### Using the Vault CLI

```
vault read -format=json vault-ethereum/accounts/alice

```
### Sample Response


```
"0xa6563cd02d14eB74a2e385cd96feD04bcaf2c5C1"
```

### 3: SEND BOBS ETH TO ALICE:
### Using the Vault CLI

```
vault write -format=json vault-ethereum/accounts/bob/transfer to="0xa6563cd02d14eB74a2e385cd96feD04bcaf2c5C1" amount="500000000000000000"

```
### Sample Response


```json
{
  "amount": "500000000000000000",
  "from": "0x90259301a101A380F7138B50b6828cfFfd4Cbf60",
  "gas_limit": "21000",
  "gas_price": "20000000000",
  "nonce": "11",
  "signed_transaction": "0xf86c0b8504a817c80082520894a6563cd02d14eb74a2e385cd96fed04bcaf2c5c18806f05b59d3b20000801ca085b6dba198ad672c0789d728545052d85c760b3106d16773a5e001103fefaf8aa07e31f9902af7678a674981908d48da3218c74d652cde4d98892e26f18890c54d",
  "to": "0xa6563cd02d14eB74a2e385cd96feD04bcaf2c5C1",
  "transaction_hash": "0x8eb44c87a40007dd991002218e272c693129ffa9e19d4685146f94d6cfcc73dd"
}
```

### HOW TO CHECK BALANCE OF THE ACCOUNT NAMED BOB:
### Using the Vault CLI

```
vault read -format=json 'vault-ethereum'/accounts/bob/balance

```
### Sample Response


```json
{
  "address": "0x90259301a101A380F7138B50b6828cfFfd4Cbf60",
  "balance": "96434141620000000000"
}
```

### HOW TO SIGN A TRANSACTION WITH DATA:
### Using the Vault CLI

```
vault write -format=json 'vault-ethereum'/accounts/alice/sign-tx to='"0x90259301a101A380F7138B50b6828cfFfd4Cbf60"' data='f86d8202b28477359400825208944592d8f8d7b001e72cb26a73e4fa1806a51ac79d880de0b6b3a7640000802ca05924bde7ef10aa88db9c66dd4f5fb16b46dff2319b9968be983118b57bb50562a001b24b31010004f13d9a26b320845257a6cfc2bf819a3d55e3fc86263c5f0772' amount=20000000000000000

```
### Sample Response


```json
{
  "amount": "20000000000000000",
  "from": "0xa6563cd02d14eB74a2e385cd96feD04bcaf2c5C1",
  "gas_limit": "21000",
  "gas_price": "20000000000",
  "nonce": "0",
  "signed_transaction": "",
  "to": "0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000",
  "transaction_hash": "0xf5cd934825d02d70229e9f8084b6cfac067455d5dbff462b6c6c177bb7414d28"
}
```

### HOW TO SIGN MESSAGE. Message signature can be verify on: https://etherscan.io/verifySig/2156:
### Using the Vault CLI

```
vault write -format=json 'vault-ethereum'/accounts/bob/sign message='HOLA VAULT'

```
### Sample Response


```json
{
  "address": "0x90259301a101a380f7138b50b6828cfffd4cbf60",
  "hashedMessage": "0x916195f5e434a5ac99bda30311516c98e3896c96e8e63e0fb7771584b7bd6b07",
  "signature": "0x79747d2859bb3c7305b33b4dae171c1f7d0f01821cbf0577577956e135c046bf0e53618cb373afd0ab92a7a13e566ebdb94f39d3ec738885d6d7f26d3c12393400"
}
```

### DEPLOY CONTRACT FixedSupplyToken:
### Using the Vault CLI

```
vault write -format=json 'vault-ethereum'/accounts/bob/deploy abi=@'/Users/immutability/projects/go/src/github.com/immutability-io/vault-ethereum/docker/erc20/build/FixedSupplyToken.abi' bin=@'/Users/immutability/projects/go/src/github.com/immutability-io/vault-ethereum/docker/erc20/build/FixedSupplyToken.bin'

```
### Sample Response


```json
{
  "contract": "0x20c60ac10d9c0E8a9044799677F413b85241d187",
  "from": "0x90259301a101A380F7138B50b6828cfFfd4Cbf60",
  "gas_limit": "1380521",
  "gas_price": "20000000000",
  "nonce": "12",
  "signed_transaction": "",
  "transaction_hash": "0xf44c5588e3d98cce1eb0370e6d97982c547f4600d578f8cb00849e940891ed03"
}
```

### DEPLOY CONTRACT Owned:
### Using the Vault CLI

```
vault write -format=json 'vault-ethereum'/accounts/bob/deploy abi=@'/Users/immutability/projects/go/src/github.com/immutability-io/vault-ethereum/docker/erc20/build/Owned.abi' bin=@'/Users/immutability/projects/go/src/github.com/immutability-io/vault-ethereum/docker/erc20/build/Owned.bin'

```
### Sample Response


```json
{
  "contract": "0x0541323aeB045A4232D61DCEbB15243687528442",
  "from": "0x90259301a101A380F7138B50b6828cfFfd4Cbf60",
  "gas_limit": "292163",
  "gas_price": "20000000000",
  "nonce": "13",
  "signed_transaction": "",
  "transaction_hash": "0x5254ce4cb3d5dc44af5a91415725e488f149fbb05a6fc99117876aba2614346e"
}
```

### DEPLOY CONTRACT SafeMath:
### Using the Vault CLI

```
vault write -format=json 'vault-ethereum'/accounts/bob/deploy abi=@'/Users/immutability/projects/go/src/github.com/immutability-io/vault-ethereum/docker/erc20/build/SafeMath.abi' bin=@'/Users/immutability/projects/go/src/github.com/immutability-io/vault-ethereum/docker/erc20/build/SafeMath.bin'

```
### Sample Response


```json
{
  "contract": "0x4B51D9340F3250971E8927bBF48ffD5f9cA99c5C",
  "from": "0x90259301a101A380F7138B50b6828cfFfd4Cbf60",
  "gas_limit": "71714",
  "gas_price": "20000000000",
  "nonce": "14",
  "signed_transaction": "",
  "transaction_hash": "0x2c9fa741988aec663a8b0138989f21d393919b0f619b0b93b400399d5717624b"
}
```

### READ TOKEN 0x20c60ac10d9c0E8a9044799677F413b85241d187 TOTAL SUPPLY:
### Using the Vault CLI

```
vault read -format=json 'vault-ethereum'/accounts/bob/erc20/totalSupply contract='0x20c60ac10d9c0E8a9044799677F413b85241d187'

```
### Sample Response


```json
{
  "contract": "0x20c60ac10d9c0E8a9044799677F413b85241d187",
  "name": "Example Fixed Supply Token",
  "symbol": "FIXED",
  "total_supply": "1000000"
}
```
